item.title: Unit testing and mocking fs.ReadFileSync
item.description: I’d just ran npm run test in a newly created package I’d added to a monorepo (lerna) I’d created for a project I was working on that integrates with Twilio Sync, RabbitMQ, Twilio TaskRouter and MSSQL, and I go this: *******************************consumers\packages\eda [CRMBROK-233 +0 ~2 -0 !]> npm run test > @cf247/eda@1.0.2 test *******************************consumers\packages\eda > jest FAIL __tests__/eda.test.js ‚óè Test suite failed to run ENOENT: no such file or directory, open '.
